text:
COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA
Proposed Resolution 20-1053 (Deemed Approved November 22, 2014)

20 DCSTAT 4760

A PROPOSED RESOLUTION

Officially Read
October 7,
2014

To confirm the reappointment of Ms. Susan Clampitt to the Commission on the Arts and Humanities.

RESOLVED, BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this
resolution may be cited as the "Commission on the Arts and Humanities Susan Clampitt
Confirmation Resolution of 2014".
Sec.2. The Council of the District of Columbia confirms the reappointment of:
Susan Clampitt
13 9th Street, S.E.
Washington, D.C. 20003
(Ward 6)
as a member of the Commission on the Arts and Humanities, established by section 4 of the
Commission on the Arts and Humanities Act, effective October 21, 1975 (D.C. Law 1-22; D.C.
Official Code § 39-203) and pursuant to section 2 of the Confirmation Act of 1978, effective
March 3, 1979 (D.C. Law 2-142; D. C. Official Code § 1-523.01), for a term to end June 30,
2017.
Sec. 3. The Council of the District of Columbia shall transmit a copy of this resolution,
upon its adoption, each to the nominee and to the Office of the Mayor.
Sec. 4. This resolution shall take effect immediately.

Commission
on the Arts
and
Humanities
Susan
Clampitt
Confirmation
Resolution of
2014
